artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige III; Publisher: Yorozuya Magobei
creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
description: horizontal chūban; accordion style book; front and back cover has thin, muted orange lines forming a woven pattern; colorful interior images that depict domestic scenes, as well as exterior farming, harvesting, and fishing scenes; image on both sides of accordion, fifteen images on each side
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Collection of Pictures of Products from Greater Japan (Dai Nippon bussan zue 大日本物産図会)
text: Set of 30 chūban prints from the series Collection of Pictures of Products from Greater Japan (Dai Nippon bussan zue 大日本物産図会) bound in an album.
title: Album of 30 prints from the series "Collection of Pictures of Products from Greater Japan"
